import React, { Component } from 'react' import './../css/cart.css' import { mainapi } from '../api/API' import { X } from '@phosphor-icons/react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { itemdet } from './Item' export class Cart extends Component { render() { return (

My Cart

{ mainapi.map(ps=>{return(

{ps.title}

Quantity 5

{ps.price} LE

)}) }

Total 999LE

) } } export default Cart
